edges.description: Values representing the edges of bins.

null_value.description: Value to which to map if there is no valid bin (e.g. if the element falls outside the bin range). The null value is the final category.

inclusive_left.description: Whether or not the left edge of the bin is inclusive, i.e. the bins are of the form [lower, upper).

name: digitize
description:
Maps data to bins.

Bins will be of the form [lower, upper) or (lower, upper]. The null value is the final category.
